div.pre: 1299 Sardes, Lydia, 1911 (925) Burial: c. 220-214 B.C. (Seyrig) Contents: 55 AR. In basis of cult statue of Artemis, from excavations Alexander III: 12 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 7, Tarsus 1,Baby- lon 3, unc. mint 1) 4 lifetime and early post. dr. (Lampsacus 1, Abydus 1, Colophon 1, Magnesia 1) 7 late post. tetradr. (Pella 2, Ephesus 1, Magnesia 1, unc. mints 3) 4 late post. dr. (unc. mints) Philip III: 1 dr. (Colophon) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. (Tarsus) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 5 lifetime tetradr. (Amphi- polis 1, Pella 1, Cius 1, Magnesia 2) 5 post. tetradr. (Cius 1, unc. mints 4) Attalus I: 1 tetradr. Antiochus I: 2 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Antiochus II: 11 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Antiocheia 1, Apameia 8, Cyme? 1) Seleucus II or III: 1 tetradr. (Laodiceia ad mare) Disposition: Istanbul Bell, Sardis XI (Leiden, 1916), pp. vf., pp. 1 ff. Franke, AM 1961, pp. 203 ff. (190/89 B.C.) Seyrig, RN 1963, pp. 23, 42
